U

UnauthorisedException - Exception in exceptions
Exception thrown when trying to add friends by calling the UserDAO
UnauthorisedException() - Constructor for exception exceptions.UnauthorisedException
 
updateCoordinates(String) - Method in class controllers.UserController
Lighter version of POST method, only updating the User User.latitude and User.longitude Triggers a "position-updated" event on Pusher
updateCoordinates(User) - Method in class services.UserService
Light version of UserService.updateUser(User), only updating the User's coordinates
updateUser(String) - Method in class controllers.UserController
Updates given User in database If friends are removed, sends a "friends-removed" event on Pusher Note that this method is a bit heavy and should be used only for the User's profile changes.
updateUser(User) - Method in class services.UserService
Updates an user.
User - Class in models
User entity
User() - Constructor for class models.User
Constructs the user with empty parameters
User(String) - Constructor for class models.User
Constructs the User with a pseudo and empty parameters
User(String, float, float) - Constructor for class models.User
Constructs the user with a pseudo and coordinates
User(String, String) - Constructor for class models.User
Constructs the user with a pseudo and a password
User(String, float, float, String) - Constructor for class models.User
Constructs the user without password
User(String, String, float, float, String) - Constructor for class models.User
Constructs a full user
UserController - Class in controllers
Controller that manages User
UserController() - Constructor for class controllers.UserController
 
UserDAO - Class in daos
DAO class that manages User
UserDAO() - Constructor for class daos.UserDAO
 
UserService - Class in services
Service class that manages User
UserService() - Constructor for class services.UserService
